DOC.brief_summary: A randomized , open-labeled , comparative 3-way crossover study compare pharmacokinetic characteristic food effect pelubiprofen ( 30mg ) tablet IR TID pelubiprofen SR ( pelubiprofen 90 mg ) tablet QD healthy subject .
DOC.brief_title: Phase 1 Study Compare Pharmacokinetic Characteristics Food Effect Pelubiprofen ( 30mg ) Tablet IR TID Pelubiprofen SR ( Pelubiprofen 90 mg ) Tablet QD Healthy Subjects
DOC.criteria: 1 . Adult Healthy male age 20~45 year 2. weight 45 kg , ideal body weight Â±20 % [ Ideal weight ] = [ Height ( cm ) 100 ] X 0.9 3 . Subjects voluntarily agree write consent 1 . Patients acute disorder within 28 day clinical trial drug administration 2 . History disorder ( inflammatory GI tract disease , stomach ulcer , gastrectomy , liver disease ) affect ADME drug 3 . Patients active GI tract , cardiovascular , respiratory , renal , endocrinal , haematological , central nerval , psychiatric disease malignant tumor
